lead_paragraph: MICHEL--Ernest W. Died peacefully at home in Manhattan, May 7, with his beloved wife, Amy Goldberg, by his side. Loving husband, father, grandfather, brother and uncle. Born July 1, 1923 in Mannheim, Germany. Survived six years in concentration camps including Auschwitz and Buchenwald. Organizing chairman of World Gathering of Jewish Holocaust Survivors. Author of "Promises to Keep." Devoted his life to serving the Jewish people through an extraordinary career for 60 years at UJA and as a mentor, educator, role model and inspiration to future generations. 1/3
